column1: Korostýšiv (Ukrainian: Корости́шів, Polish: Korosteszów, Russian: Коростышев) is a city in Zhytomyr Oblast, Ukraine. It serves as the administrative center of Korostyshiv Raion.
It was a town in Radomyslsky Uyezd of the Kyiv Governorate of the Russian Empire.
In January 1989 the population was 28 046 people.
